hudson.model.ChoiceParameterDefinition.name: PROXY
hudson.model.ChoiceParameterDefinition.description: Which proxy to switch capcom to.

hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
eval ${SETUPKEYS}
SCRIPT_KEY="/CP/CP_PROXY_RESTART_SCRIPT" CFG_FILE_KEY="/CP/CP_PROXY_CONFIG_FILE" PROXY_NAME_KEY="/CP/CP_PROXY" DOCKER_CMD_KEY="/CP/CP_PROXY_DOCKER_COMMAND" # v3 vs v2 compat. eval '$SSHCMD systemctl cat bootstrap|grep v3' if [ "$?"=="0" ]; then SCRIPT_KEY="/capcom/config/proxy-restart-script" CFG_FILE_KEY="/capcom/config/proxy-config-file" PROXY_NAME_KEY="/capcom/config/proxy" DOCKER_CMD_KEY="/capcom/config/proxy-docker-command" fi
# eval'ed literal quotes are hard # pretty ham dard. if [ "$PROXY" = "haproxy" ]; then export RESTART_SCRIPT="/restart_haproxy_docker.sh" export CONFIG=/etc/haproxy/haproxy.cfg export IMAGE=haproxy:1.5.14 eval "${SSHCMD} etcdctl set $DOCKER_CMD_KEY \"\\\"haproxy -f /etc/haproxy/haproxy.cfg\"\\\"" else export RESTART_SCRIPT="/restart_nginx_docker.sh" export CONFIG=/etc/nginx/nginx.conf export IMAGE=nginx:1.9.5 eval "${SSHCMD} etcdctl set $DOCKER_CMD_KEY \"\\\"nginx -g 'daemon off;'\"\\\"" fi
eval ${SSHCMD} etcdctl set $PROXY_NAME_KEY $PROXY eval ${SSHCMD} etcdctl set $SCRIPT_KEY $RESTART_SCRIPT eval ${SSHCMD} etcdctl set $CFG_FILE_KEY $CONFIG eval ${SSHCMD} etcdctl set /images/proxy $IMAGE
